864790.name: FragmentVR
864790.description:
FragmentVR is a VR application for HTC Vive owners that makes use of the front camera to create windows onto your surroundings from within virtual reality.
FragmentVR puts each view into a SteamVR Overlay so that you can create and use them while inside any other VR game or app.
HTC Vive Pro is currently not supported

Usage is simple: Place corners using the controller. Once 4 corners have been placed the view is created and remains fixed in 3D space.

Upcoming Features & improvements:

  • HTC Vive Pro support
  • other HMDs + external camera support


Check out our to complain about bugs and request features!


FragmentVR is only compatible with the standard HTC Vive for now since it is the only HMD with an accessible camera (HTC Vive Pro support is high on the to-do list but not currently supported ).
